item.title: So how did you find MITB?
item.dc:creator: @swordskid61 Swordskid61
item.description:
@swordskid61 wrote:

[quote=“Gotta Catch Them All, post:68, topic:157788”][quote author=Swordskid61 link=topic=215105.msg1883418#msg1883418 date=1195234650]

I found this site through Kaitneiks when it was starting to fail. Then after kaitneiks stopped, I came here.

Your ass is lying. I can tell already, not just because you’re a junior but because of this:

when it was starting to fail.

and that the fact of his registering date was:

November 15, 2007, 09:03:46 PM
[/quote]

Finding this site and registering don’t always have to happen at the same time.[/quote]
good point.

Read full topic

item.title: So how did you find MITB?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Rajae:

I found this site through Kaitneiks when it was starting to fail. Then after kaitneiks stopped, I came here.

I didn’t install forums until 2 weeks after kaitnieks.com was dead and buried. However I did have a wordpress blog where I posted my SCAR scripts and moparscape (before private servers) maybe that is what you are talking about?

item.title: So how did you find MITB?
item.dc:creator: @daycrawler daycrawler
item.description:
@daycrawler wrote:

[quote=“killerman93, post:61, topic:157788”][quote author=daycrawler link=topic=215105.msg1880022#msg1880022 date=1194943197]

It’s okay. You might want to standarize what you make capital and what you leave in lowercase because it’s makes it look more professional. Just little things make the extra mile.
My work deals with Perl, JS, Html etc. My dad’s website I helped code alot of it and I’m like a month-two from launching my website but my dad’s which shows a minor portion of my capabilites is www.floormatguys.com
No, I don’t know PHP, I use perl, it’s cleaner and more efficent

[/quote]

Legit’s site pwns your site, looks way better. It also loads faster in my browsers.[/quote]
On the factors of looks yes it does but my site wasn’t intended to look amazing its intent was to be straight forward and simple for the average internet user.

Read full topic
item.source: So how did you find MITB?

[/quote]

https://www.yoonew.com/market/

I coded basically everything on that website except for the homepage. And much of the JS.

Let’s see your work.[/quote]

Nice site Legit, I do have to say it’s very flashy.

item.title: So how did you find MITB?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:57, topic:157788”][quote author=ThAt0n36Uy link=topic=215105.msg1877491#msg1877491 date=1194606586]
I wonder how Moparisthebest found this place?
[/quote]

Pretty much the same way he did:

run escape -> google “run scape hacks” -> kaitnieks -> moparisthebest (inappropriate use of arrows :/)

I actually found rstools.prv.pl from google, which lead me to sythe.org which lead me to kaitnieks.[/quote]
thats the one! rstools.prv.pl … ahh the days where i sat there trying every single scar 2.03 script. =D

Read full topic

item.title: So how did you find MITB?
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

I found MITB by roaming around MSCP back in the day… I saw it in someone’s sig and visited. I didn’t like it much then but that was probably because I was so much into “coding” private servers. I finally found my sanity and came here, where I am slowly losing it again, but not as bad as I did on Moparscape.

Read full topic
